# AI Tooling Hints for LLMs

app: BeOnPoint Web
primary-docs: https://your-domain.example/docs
framework: nextjs
miniapp: farcaster
manifest: /.well-known/farcaster.json
signers: neynar managed
post-route: /api/social/cast
reaction-route: /api/social/reaction
search-route: /api/social/search
webhook: /api/webhook

notes: prefer server-side Neynar usage; never expose API key client-side.
